I just had a sudden feeling that Jaime will die at the end, but not with his siblings like everyone theorizes. 

I think he’s gonna die saving Bran.

summary: Different Roads Sometimes Lead to the Same Castle - HockeyShit - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Different Roads Sometimes Lead to the Same Castle - HockeyShit - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Different Roads Sometimes Lead to the Same Castle 

“Remember when father used to tell us stories about Robert’s rebellion? Robb and I loved those stories, we dreamt that someday we’d ride side by side into battle. Father always made it out to be more glorious than it probably was.”
On the eve of danger, the four remaining Stark kids settle into what used to be their Lord Father’s bed and tell their own stories.

I said I wanted it, so…you know, write the fic you want to see in the world

summary: Theory: Bran’s favorite song for Meera used to be “Can’t Take My Eyes Off You” and now that he has transformed into the...
body:
Theory:

Bran’s favorite song for Meera used to be “Can’t Take My Eyes Off You” and now that he has transformed into the Three-Eyed-Raven, the song’s lyrics are deleted from his memory except for the fact that he remembers the title of the song. He doesn’t know why but the song’s name keeps popping up into his head from time to time.

Bran’s entire creepiness is his way of trying to remember Meera through enacting the literal meaning of the song’s name.

reblog.comment:

He doesn’t know why but the song’s name keeps popping up into his head from time to time.

Bran’s entire creepiness is his way of trying to remember Meera through enacting the literal meaning of the song’s name.

He doesn’t know why but the song’s name keeps popping up into his head from time to time.

Bran’s entire creepiness is his way of trying to remember Meera through enacting the literal meaning of the song’s name.

Theory:

Bran’s entire creepiness is his way of trying to remember Meera through enacting the literal meaning of the song’s name.

tags: ‘is this person in a highly emotional and volatile state of mind?’
‘perfect now go tell jon the big news!’
summary: Bran “you looked so beautiful the night your husband brutalized you” and “your dragon-child’s a dead slave zombie now get over...
body: Bran “you looked so beautiful the night your husband brutalized you” and “your dragon-child’s a dead slave zombie now get over it” Stark finally realized maybe someone with more tact and emotional capacity should deliver the news of Jon’s real parents and yet he still managed to fuck it up somehow.

reblog.comment: Bran “you looked so beautiful the night your husband brutalized you” and “your dragon-child’s a dead slave zombie now get over it” Stark finally realized maybe someone with more tact and emotional capacity should deliver the news of Jon’s real parents and yet he still managed to fuck it up somehow.

summary: Bran really could've just sat everyone down immediately and been like: "hey, the wall fell, Jon's actually Rhaegar's son and the...
body:
Bran really could’ve just sat everyone down immediately and been like: “hey, the wall fell, Jon’s actually Rhaegar’s son and the true heir to the iron throne, cersei betrayed us and has the golden company, jaime lannister is on his way here, but don’t execute him he’s gonna help and he’s not such a bad dude anymore, and the night king has a dragon now”

But he didn’t do that cuz he’s a messy bitch and he’s committed to the drama and I have to respect that.

reblog.comment:

But he didn’t do that cuz he’s a messy bitch and he’s committed to the drama and I have to respect that.

But he didn’t do that cuz he’s a messy bitch and he’s committed to the drama and I have to respect that.

summary: Game of Thrones Season 8 Episode 2 Promo Things to point at: Jon left Dany and Sansa side by side. This call a disaster Jon....
caption:
Game of Thrones Season 8 Episode 2 Promo

Things to point at:

  • Jon left Dany and Sansa side by side. This call a disaster Jon.
  • Brienne is strategically situated so she can come up faster and protect her man if need to. Go, Girl!!
  • I swear that Bran is a gif
  • Tyrion is not pleased with Dany’s attitude. Same, Tyrion, same.
  • Would not be ironic if Daenerys is pissed of Jaime killing Aerys?. Jaime killed a King to save a city and she killed Sam’s father and brother for not siding with her.
  • I get the feeling that Sansa will side with Jaime. She will do it because she believes him, believes Brienne or just to antagonize Dany? I don’t know but I’m with her.
